text: Brian Tyree Henry (born March 31, 1982)https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QJ2F-LBTS is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Alfred "Paper Boi" Miles in the FX comedy-drama series Atlanta. He also appeared as Lemon in the 2022 action- comedy movie Bullet Train. In 2023, he was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in the movie Causeway. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from North Carolina
title: Brian Tyree Henry
